Method.name: CommonListElements
Method.Description: Returns the elements present in all the input lists. These may be specified as a single list of lists, or as separate parameters. The items are returned in the order they appear in in the first list. If objects are passed in, they are compared by Oref, i.e. they have to be the same object to qualify.

Method.name: GetCopy
Method.Description: Returns an empty copy of a collection object, of the same type as the input collection, but one that can exist stand-alone. (The %Collection classes can only exists as properties of an object.) The collection contents are not copied unless CopyContents is true.
